Body:
NEW!  For Network Marketers:

How’d you like us to build your downline?

With good people.

Who go all-in.

And work hard.

And don’t complain.

And get results.

So you can make more.

And stress less.

And stop doing stuff you hate.

Like:

Begging, hosting, calling, spamming, pressuring.

I’m serious.

We do everything.

You get all the credit.

And:

You prove your haters wrong.

Plus:

Your checks get bigger by the week.

Picture that.

How would your life change?

Would you drop down hours at work?

Retire altogether?

Spend more time with friends and family?

Pay some stuff off?

Buy new toys?

Travel?

Volunteer?

Donate to charity?

All the above?

Look, I know this sounds too good to be true.

But it’s not.

And… I’ll tell you why.

Hey, it’s Steve, from:

DFYDownline.com

Here’s the deal:

I work with a handful of all-star marketers.

Together, we build done-for-you marketing funnels.

Basically:

A system… to take people from:

“Who the heck are you?”

To:

“Here, take my money.”

Make sense?

Good.

So, up until now?

We’ve only done this for coaches and consultants.

Despite hundreds of network marketers asking us if we could do the same thing… for them.

We said no.

Why?

We wanted to stay in our lane.

But enough’s enough.

Too many hard-working reps need our help.

And if anyone can deliver?

It’s us.

Which is why I’m writing you, today.

To announce our new done-for-you downline service.

It’s for you if:

1, you’re a network marketer.

2, you’re fun to work with.

3, you have a budget.

That last one, by the way, is why this is not too good to be true.

Because:

This service?

Ain’t cheap.

Plus, you’ll need extra money for Facebook ads.

Maybe $15 a day to start.

So it’s not for everyone.

But I do have some good news:

Since it’s a new niche for us?

Guess what?

The first 25 clients who sign up… will get half-off!

Just so we can collect some testimonials.

Then, we’ll bump it back to full price.

Alright?

Let’s recap:

> If you’re a network marketer.

> And you want us to build your downline.

> And you’ve got a budget.

> But you’d love to save 50% on this brand new done-for-you service?

Go here:

DFYDownline.com

Enter a valid email.

Check your inbox.

And we’ll send you a short, tell-all video.

Plus dozens of case studies from our other clients, outside of network marketing. 

That way, you’ll know we’re legit.

And that… we can blow up anyone’s business.

Including yours.

Even if you’re a total newbie.

Even if you’ve never sponsored anyone before.

And especially if courses and coaching programs have left you high and dry.

None of that matters.

Truth is:

All you need is a fabulous funnel - like this.

Running all day, every day.

Capturing leads.

Educating them.

Entertaining them.

Qualifying them.

Screening them.

Getting them excited to work with you.

All automated.

Can you see it?

While you’re watching Netflix:

People are getting in line… to go all-in under you.

Then:

You just call ‘em back and sign ‘em up.

Easy peasy.

And if you don’t believe me?

Do me a favor:

Keep going through our funnel.

(Yep, this one.)

And pay close attention to:

The personality, the positioning, the pages, the videos, the emails, the whole silky-smooth process.

And ask yourself:

“What if I had the same thing?”

“Would I not be enrolling people left and right?”

I bet I know the answer.

But, you tell me:

DFYDownline.com

Steve

PS, only the first 25 network marketers get half-off:

DFYDownline.com

PPS, still, don’t pay us a penny till you’re absolutely sure it’ll work for you:

DFYDownline.com

Link:

                    Do You Want Us To Build Your Downline?                

If so, click and enter your email.
